    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RookieGuard(int xP, int yP, char Elm)
      Creates a Guard of the Rookie type(its the normal guard without any characteristic to distinguish him)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean update(Map currentmap, char heromove)
      Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn

    • Constructor Detail

      • RookieGuard

        public RookieGuard(int xP,
                   int yP,
                   char Elm)
        Creates a Guard of the Rookie type(its the normal guard without any characteristic to distinguish him)
        Parameters:
        xP - Rookie's matrix position - Line
        yP - Rookie's matrix position - Column
        Elm - Char that represents the Rookie in the matrix

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public boolean update(Map currentmap,
                      char heromove)
        Description copied from class: Guard
        Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn
        Overrides:
        update in class Guard
        Parameters:
        currentmap - map where the character position is set
        heromove - char that represents the move that the character is supossed to do
        Returns:
        true if the character has been moved, else returns false
